name: Barbell Squat
description: A compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings. Place the barbell on your upper back, squat down until your thighs are parallel to the floor, and return to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: A chest exercise that works the pectorals, triceps, and anterior deltoids. Lie on a bench, hold dumbbells in each hand, and press them upward.

name: Pull-ups
description: A compound upper body exercise that works the back and biceps. Hang from a pull-up bar and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: A hamstring and glute exercise. Hold a barbell, hinge at the hips, and lower the barbell toward the floor, keeping your back straight.

name: Overhead Press
description: A shoulder exercise that works the deltoids and triceps. Press a barbell or dumbbells overhead.

name: Treadmill Run
description: A cardio exercise that improves cardiovascular fitness. Run on a treadmill at a desired speed and incline.

name: Leg Press
description: Lower body exercise working quads, glutes, and hamstrings, while seated push the platform away from you.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: An upper body exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi. Pull a bar down to your chest while seated.

name: Plank
description: A core exercise that strengthens the abdominal muscles. Hold a push-up position with your forearms on the ground.

name: Dumbbell Rows
description: An upper body exercise that targets the back and biceps. Row dumbbells towards your torso.

name: Cycling
description: Cardio exercise that works many lower body muscles. Cycle on a stationary bike.

name: Push-ups
description: A classic upper body exercise that works the chest, shoulders, and triceps.  Perform exercise on the floor.

name: Deadlift
description: A full-body exercise that works nearly every muscle, but emphasizes the posterior chain. Lift a loaded barbell from the floor to a standing position.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: A full body exercise that improves power and endurance, especially in the posterior chain. Swing a kettlebell from between your legs to shoulder height.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise for the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Lie on a bench and press a barbell upwards.

name: Squat
description: A fundamental lower body exercise. Squat down as if sitting in a chair, keeping your back straight.

name: Lunges
description: A lower body exercise that works the quads, glutes, and hamstrings. Step forward and lower your body until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.

name: Shoulder Press
description: An upper body exercise for the shoulders. Press dumbbells or a barbell overhead.

name: Bicep Curl
description: An isolation exercise for the biceps. Curl dumbbells or a barbell towards your shoulders.

name: Triceps Extension
description: An isolation exercise for the triceps. Extend dumbbells or a barbell overhead or behind your head.

name: Dead Bug
description: A core exercise that improves stability and coordination. Lie on your back and extend opposite arm and leg.

name: Russian Twist
description: A core exercise that targets the obliques. Twist your torso from side to side while holding a weight or with bodyweight.

name: High Knees
description: A cardio exercise that involves bringing your knees towards your chest.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A full body cardio exercise that involves jumping while moving your arms and legs.

name: Burpees
description: A full body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: A strength exercise that involves carrying heavy weights in each hand for a certain distance.

name: Calf Raises
description: An isolation exercise for the calf muscles. Raise your heels off the ground while standing.

name: Hammer Curls
description: A variation of bicep curls, where the dumbbells are held with palms facing each other.

name: Triceps Dips
description: An exercise for triceps using bodyweight. Dip your body using parallel bars or a bench.

name: Front Squat
description: A variation of the squat where the barbell is held in front of the shoulders.

name: Good Mornings
description: An exercise for the hamstrings and lower back.  Place a barbell on your upper back and hinge at the hips.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: Similar to dumbbell bench press, but performed on an incline bench to target the upper chest.

name: Decline Dumbbell Press
description: Similar to dumbbell bench press, but performed on a decline bench to target the lower chest.

name: Pull-up Negatives
description: Focuses on the lowering portion of the pull-up.  Jump to the top position and slowly lower yourself down.

name: Chin-ups
description: Similar to pull-ups, but with palms facing you, emphasizing the biceps more.

name: Lateral Raises
description: A shoulder exercise that works the deltoids. Raise your arms to the sides with dumbbells.

name: Front Raises
description: A shoulder exercise that works the anterior deltoids. Raise your arms to the front with dumbbells or a barbell.

name: Rear Delt Fly
description: A shoulder exercise that works the posterior deltoids.  Raise your arms to the sides while bent over.

name: Arnold Press
description: A variation of the shoulder press with a rotation of the wrists.

name: Concentration Curls
description: An isolation exercise for the biceps. Curl a dumbbell while seated, resting your elbow on your inner thigh.

name: Skullcrushers
description: A triceps exercise performed lying down.  Extend a barbell or dumbbells over your head.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
description: A variation of the bench press that emphasizes the triceps.  Use a narrower grip.

name: Lat Pulldown (Various Grips)
description: Targets the latissimus dorsi with different hand positions (wide, narrow, underhand).

name: Seated Cable Rows
description: An exercise for the back.  Pull a cable towards your torso while seated.

name: Face Pulls
description: An exercise for the upper back and rear shoulders.  Pull a cable towards your face.

name: Hyperextensions
description: An exercise for the lower back.  Extend your torso while lying face down on a hyperextension bench.

name: Glute Bridges
description: An exercise for the glutes.  Lift your hips off the ground while lying on your back.

name: Hamstring Curls
description: An isolation exercise for the hamstrings.  Curl your lower legs towards your glutes.

name: Leg Extensions
description: An isolation exercise for the quadriceps.  Extend your lower legs.

name: Standing Calf Raises
description: Raise your heels off the ground while standing, targeting the calf muscles.

name: Seated Calf Raises
description: Raise your heels off the ground while seated, targeting the calf muscles.

name: Walking Lunges
description: A variation of lunges where you walk forward with each step.

name: Step-ups
description: Step onto a platform or bench, working the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Box Jumps
description: Jump onto a box, a plyometric exercise for power and explosiveness.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic full-body exercise that works the core and elevates the heart rate.

name: Russian Twists
description: A core exercise that targets the obliques. Twist your torso from side to side while holding a weight or with bodyweight.

name: Bear Crawl
description: A full-body exercise that involves crawling on your hands and feet.

name: Jumping Rope
description: A cardio exercise that improves coordination and cardiovascular health.

name: Sprints
description: High-intensity running for short distances.

name: Stair Climber
description: A cardio machine that simulates climbing stairs.

name: Elliptical Trainer
description: A cardio machine that provides a low-impact, full-body workout.

name: Rowing Machine
description: A full-body cardio exercise that works the legs, core, and upper body.

name: Cool down
description: Gentle exercise to gradually decrease activity levels after a workout.

name: Foam Rolling
description: Self-myofascial release technique to relieve muscle tightness and improve recovery.

name: Dynamic Stretching
description: Stretching with movement, such as arm circles or leg swings, to improve mobility.

name: Static Stretching
description: Holding a stretch in a fixed position to improve flexibility.
